meanings.definition: Exact copies of a document or image made using a photographic process.
meanings.sent1: I keep all the photoduplicates of important papers in a safe folder.
meanings.sent2: The office needed photoduplicates of the contract for everyone to sign.
meanings.sent3: My cat knocked over the stack of photoduplicates, creating a paper avalanche!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a room filled with photoduplicates of every moment she cherished.
meanings.sent5: The photoduplicates were so clear, it was hard to tell them apart from the originals.

meanings.definition: To make exact copies of a document or image using a photographic process.
meanings.sent1: I will photoduplicate these important papers for safekeeping.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to photoduplicate the old photos for the archives.
meanings.sent3: He photoduplicates so fast, it's like he has a copying superpower!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to photoduplicate, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The machine whirred softly as it photoduplicated each page with precision.
